Name: Pizza Margherita
Description: Your very own Margherita - now with a spicy twist! Loaded with our signature spicy schezwan sauce & 100% mozzarella cheese
Ingredients: Flour-Active dry yeast-water-sugar-salt-extra virgin olive oil-tomatoes-mozzarella-basil-red pepper flakes

Name: Pizza Calzone
Description: Easy Calzones make for a fun lunch or dinner! Filled with all the classic toppings - Italian sausage + salami + mozzarella + veggies and a great tomato sauce
Ingredients: Flour-Active dry yeast-water-sugar-salt-extra virgin olive oil-tomatoes-mozzarella-feta-salami-sausage-mushrooms-bell peppers-red onions

Name: Pizza Prosciutto e funghi
Description: Great pizza topped with tomato sauce + mozzarella + thin slices of prosciutto cotto and mushrooms
Ingredients: Flour-Active dry yeast-water-sugar-salt-extra virgin olive oil-tomatoes-mozzarella-prosciutto cotto-mushrooms
